projects.description: A 3D modular game engine written in C++, lua is used for scripting, game objects are handled by the entity component system (ECM). I started this project thanks to the cherno's game engine series, but I want to make it the project of my lifetime and keep on develping it!

projects.title: dot-files
projects.description: My GNU/Linux configuration files for Lina(my main PC) and Tresdin(my laptop), I love Linux and will never go back to proprietary operating systems, I use Artix(btw) because it makes my life much easier with it's rolling release, wonderful wiki, perfect package manger and amazing AUR, I use Gentoo on my laptop because of it's customization and my curiosity to know more about my system
